/home/kien/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/smpi_script/bin/smpif90    -g CMakeFiles/fort_args.dir/fort_args/fort_args.f90.o  -o fort_args/fort_args -Wl,-rpath,/home/kien/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/lib ../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.21 -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_context.so -lpthread -lrt /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so -lgfortran   -Wl,--as-needed -latomic -Wl,--no-as-needed
